T04vasbocpu:700: 7 / punaḥ khalu bodhisattvaḥ paśyati sarvaṃ kuśalamakuśalamātmānamanātmānaṃ bhūtamabhūtaṃ
T04vasbocpu:701: śūnyamaśūnyaṃ saṃvṛtaṃ paramārthaṃ samyaksamādhi mithyāsamādhi saṃskṛtamasaṃskṛtaṃ
T04vasbocpu:702: sāsravamanāsravaṃ kṛṣṇadharmaṃ śukladharmaṃ jātimaraṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ dharmadhātusvabhāvamekalakṣaṇamalakṣaṇam /

T04vasbocpu:716: akalyāṇamitrāṇi śikṣayanti parihartamanuttarāṃ śraddhāmudāttaṃ saṃkalpamanuttamaṃ vīryaṃ samuccetuṃ ca saṃkliṣṭācārān /
T04vasbocpu:717: dvitīyaṃ prajahāti strīrūpaṃ kāmarāgaṃ pṛthagjanairvivikto bhavatyasahacaraḥ /
T04vasbocpu:719: caturthaṃ prajahāti dveṣapratidhamauddhatyaṃ mānamīrṣvāmasūyāṃ yato jayate kalahaḥ pratihanyate kuśalacittam /
T04vasbocpu:720: pañcamaṃ prajahāti pramādaṃ madamānaṃ kausīdyaṃ svakaṃ parittakuśalaṃ ca yenāvajānāti parān /
T04vasbocpu:721: ṣaṣṭhaṃ prajahāti tairthikāgamaṃ kāvyāni na cābuddhabhāṣitāni praśaṃsati /
T04vasbocpu:724: uktaṃ bhagavatā na paśyāmi tathānyāndharmānya āvṛṇvanti buddhamārgaṃ yatheme saptadharmāḥ/
T04vasbocpu:730: śrāvakā api bodhisattvaṃ gambhīradharmakośe pāramitāsu saṃpratiṣṭhāpayanto bhavanti bodhisattvasya kalpāṇamitrāṇi /
T04vasbocpu:734: tṛtīyaṃ bodhisattvena draṣṭavyaḥ kāyo malabhūmivadaśucisaṃśrayaḥ kevalaṃ vātaśleṣmapittalohitakamarāgārho
T04vasbocpu:735: dine dine maraṇonmukho 'nādarabuddhyā parihartavyaḥ sotsāhaṃ bhāvayitavyo mārgaḥ /
T04vasbocpu:736: caturthaṃ bodhisattvena nityaṃ caritavyā śāntiḥ kṣāntirgurukaraṇīyā mṛdutāca /
T04vasbocpu:738: paṃcamaṃ bodhisattvenācaritavyaṃ vīryamutpādayitavyā hrīrapatrapā ca pūjayitavya upādhyāyaḥ karuṇāyitavyā dīnā duḥkhitāndṭaṣṭrā svakāyena parigrahītavyaṃ tadduḥkham /
T04vasbocpu:739: ṣaṣṭhaṃ bodhisattvenabhāvayitavyaṃ vipulaṃ mahāyānabodhisattvapiṭakaṃ grahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā dharmmā buddhānuśaṃsitāḥ /
T04vasbocpu:742: bhūtalakṣaṇamekalakṣaṇamalakṣaṇam bodhisattvaścetkāmayate śīghramabhisambodhimabhyupagantavyā evamime sapta dharmāḥ /
T04vasbocpu:743: 3 / punaḥ khalu puruṣaḥ prāptihetorutpādayati ced bodhicittamaprameyamasaṃkhyeyaṃ kalpaṃ saṃgṛhṇati maitrīṃkaruṇāṃ muditāmupekṣāṃ dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñām /
T04vasbocpu:744: jñātavyaṃ na sa puruṣaḥ prajñahāti jātimaraṇam /

T04vasbocpu:759: cittaṃ nāma manovijñānamevaṃ vijñānaskandho mana āyatanaṃ mano dhātuḥ /

T04vasbocpu:776: na ca prajñāvāptirna ca prajñā dṭaṣṭiḥ /

T04vasbocpu:796: na bhākharā na moho na prajñā na caipo 'nto na so 'nta nāpi ca madhyasrota iticocyate na bandhaḥ //

T04vasbocpu:803: bodhisattvo yadyevaṃ jānāti skandhadhātvāyatanasvabhāvaṃ na cagṛhṇātītyucyate dharmakṣāntiḥ /

T04vasbocpu:808: paśyantyākāśe likhitāni lekhaspaṣṭatayāvagacchanti vācayanti gṛhnanti dhārayanti
T04vasbocpu:810: yaśca likhatyākāśe yaśca jānātyākāśākṣarāṇi sa nu cintayituṃ śakyo yaśca vā prakāśayati deśayatyācarati gṛhṇāti dhārayati nayāte sattvānvimocayati vandham //
T04vasbocpu:813: sarveṣāṃ kāle 'hamāsaṃ cakravarta sarve cārāgitāstepūjitāste buddhāśca buddhaputrāśca prāptavyahetorna ca mayā prāptaṃ vyākaraṇam /

T04vasbocpu:826: labdhā ca sarvānutpādā dharmakṣāntistadā labdhaṃ vyākaraṇam /

T04vasbocpu:837: 6 / nūnamasukaramacintyaṃ yaducyate dharmābhāve dharmābhāve dharmalakṣaṇaṃ prāptavyābhāve prāptidharmāḥ /

T04vasbocpu:873: caturthaṃ paśyanbhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhinnaṃ dvidhāvibhaktaṃ paramparaṃ vivadamānaṃ bhaṇḍanaṃ kurvāṇaṃ gavepayatyupāyaṃ saṃgamayati ca /
T04vasbocpu:874: pañcamaṃ paśyannāṣṭre vardhamānānyaśubhāni kṣīyamāṇānbuddhadharmāndeśayati tathā vācayati yāvadekāmapi gāthāṃ yenānucchinno bhavati dharmaḥ
T04vasbocpu:875: ekacittaṃ paripālayati dharmaṃ na ca gaṇayati kāyajīvitam /

T04vasbocpu:884: idaṃ sūtraṃ cittamutpādayituṃ nayati cāvabodhayati ca baddhasattvān /
T04vasbocpu:888: kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraścetkāmayante saṃgrahītumanuttarāṃ bodhi deśayitavyamevaṃ rūpaṃ sūtraṃ /

T04vasbocpu:908: vacaraḥ śṛṇoti cedaṃ sūtraṃ svātmānaṃ dhanyaṃ manyate /
T04vasbocpu:910: yaḥ kaścillikhatīdaṃ vācayatīdaṃ sūtraṃ jñātavyaṃ sa puruṣaḥ prāpnotyaprameyamaparyantaṃ puṇyaphalavipākam /

T04vasbocpu:914: yasminpradeśe dharmaśāstā deśayatīdaṃ sūtraṃ jñātavyaṃ tasminpradeśe stūpaḥ kārayitavyaḥ /
T04vasbocpu:917: edaṃ sūtraṃ yasmindeśe nagarai grāme vihāre kuṭayāṃ vā bhavati jñātavyaṃ tatra bhavati [3 tathāgatasya] dharmakāyaḥ /
T04vasbocpu:918: yadi puruṣaḥ pūjayati gandhapuṣpaiḥ saṃgītena vitānena camaracchatrairgītaiḥ stautrairnamaskāraiḥ
T04vasbocpu:919: jñātavyaṃ sa puruṣa buddhabījaṃ bahulikaroti ki punarvaktavyaṃ yo niravaśeṣaṃ gṛhṇati
